item.title: CVE-2024-27987|2024-03-15T10:26:17.334Z -- GiveWP -- Give
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in GiveWP Give allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Give: from n/a through 3.3.1.
